entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -16.4°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -16.4°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %

Dewpoint: -18.3°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 6:47 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:47 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and risk of freezing rain. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:47 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
